content.prompt: Which of the following best explains how racialist ideology influenced nationalism in the late nineteenth century?

choices.label: It provided a justification for widening the voting franchise to reflect the popular will.
It provided a supposedly scientific way of defining national cultures.
It provided Romantic idealists support for their belief that emotional ties created nation-states.
It provided a motive for incorporating colonized peoples into the nation.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
